==Events==
* [[768]] &ndash; [[Carloman I]] and [[Charlemagne]] are crowned Kings of [[List of Frankish kings|The Franks]].
*[[1238]] &ndash; [[James I of Aragon]] conquers [[Valencia (autonomous community)|Valencia]] and founds the [[Kingdom of Valencia]].
*[[1264]] &ndash; The [[Kingdom of Castile]] conquers the city of [[Jerez]] that was under Muslim occupation since [[711]].
*[[1446]] &ndash; The [[hangul]] alphabet is published in Korea.
*[[1514]] &ndash; Marriage of [[Louis XII of France]] and [[Mary Tudor (queen consort of France)|Mary Tudor]].
*[[1557]] &ndash; [[Trujillo, Venezuela|Trujillo]] is founded in [[Venezuela]].
*[[1558]] &ndash; [[Mérida, Mérida|Mérida]] is founded in [[Venezuela]].
*[[1582]] &ndash; Because of the implementation of the [[Gregorian calendar]], this day does not exist in this year in Italy, Poland, Portugal and Spain.
*[[1594]] &ndash; The [[Portuguese Empire]] army is annihilated by the [[Kingdom of Kandy]] on [[Sri Lanka]], bringing an end to the [[Campaign of Danture]].
*[[1595]] &ndash; The Spanish army captures [[Cambrai]].
*[[1604]] &ndash; [[Supernova 1604]], the most recent supernova to be observed in the [[Milky Way]].
*[[1635]] &ndash; Founder of [[Rhode Island]] [[Roger Williams (theologian)|Roger Williams]] is banished from the [[Massachusetts Bay Colony]] as a religious dissident after he speaks out against punishments for religious offenses and giving away [[Native Americans in the United States|Native American]] land.
*[[1701]] &ndash; The Collegiate School of Connecticut (later renamed [[Yale University]]) is chartered in [[Old Saybrook, Connecticut]].
*[[1708]] &ndash; [[Peter the Great]] defeats the Swedes at the [[Battle of Lesnaya]].
*[[1740]] &ndash; [[Dutch East Indies|Dutch colonists]] and various slave groups begin [[1740 Batavia massacre|massacring]] ethnic [[Chinese Indonesians|Chinese]] in [[Jakarta|Batavia]], eventually killing 10,000 and leading to a [[Java War (1741–1743)|two-year-long war]] throughout [[Java]].
*[[1760]] &ndash; [[Seven Years' War]]: Russian forces occupy Berlin.
*[[1767]] &ndash; Surveying for the [[Mason–Dixon line]] separating [[Maryland]] from [[Pennsylvania]] is completed.
*[[1771]] &ndash; The [[Netherlands|Dutch]] merchant ship ''[[Vrouw Maria]]'' sinks near the coast of Finland.
*[[1799]] &ndash; Sinking of [[HMS Lutine (1779)|HMS ''Lutine'']], with the loss of 240 men and a cargo worth £1,200,000.
*[[1804]] &ndash; [[Hobart]], capital of [[Tasmania]], is founded.
*[[1806]] &ndash; [[Prussia]] declares war on France.
*[[1812]] &ndash; [[War of 1812]]: In a naval engagement on [[Lake Erie]], American forces capture two British ships: {{HMS|Detroit|1812|6}} and [[HMS Caledonia (1807)|HMS ''Caledonia'']].
*[[1820]] &ndash; [[Guayaquil]] declares independence from Spain.
*[[1824]] &ndash; [[Slavery]] is abolished in [[Costa Rica]].
*[[1831]] &ndash; [[Ioannis Kapodistrias]], the first head of state of independent Greece is [[assassination|assassin]]ated.
*[[1834]] &ndash; Opening of the [[Dublin and Kingstown Railway]], the first public railway on the island of Ireland.
*[[1845]] &ndash; The eminent and controversial [[Anglicanism|Anglican]], [[John Henry Newman]], is received into the [[Roman Catholic Church]].
*[[1854]] &ndash; [[Crimean War]]: The [[Siege of Sevastopol (1854–1855)|siege of Sebastopol]] begins.
*[[1861]] &ndash; [[American Civil War]]: [[Battle of Santa Rosa Island]] &ndash; [[United States|Union]] troops repel a [[Confederate States of America|Confederate]] attempt to capture [[Fort Pickens]].
*[[1864]] &ndash; American Civil War: [[Battle of Tom's Brook]] &ndash; [[United States|Union]] cavalrymen in the [[Shenandoah Valley]] defeat [[Confederate States of America|Confederate]] forces at [[Tom's Brook, Virginia]].
*[[1873]] &ndash; A meeting at the [[U.S. Naval Academy]] establishes the [[U.S. Naval Institute]].
*[[1874]] &ndash; [[General Postal Union]] is created as a result of the [[Treaty of Berne]].
*[[1888]] &ndash; The [[Washington Monument]] officially opens to the general public.
*[[1907]] &ndash; [[Las Cruces, New Mexico]] is incorporated.
*[[1911]] &ndash; An [[Wuchang Uprising#Revolutionary groups and a bombing incident|accidental bomb explosion]] in [[Hankou District|Hankou]], [[Wuhan]], China leads to the ultimate fall of the [[Qing Empire]]
*[[1913]] &ndash; Steamship {{SS|Volturno|1906|6}} catches fire in the mid-Atlantic.
*[[1914]] &ndash; [[World War I]]: [[Siege of Antwerp (1914)|Siege of Antwerp]] &ndash; [[Antwerp]], Belgium falls to German troops.
*[[1919]] &ndash; [[Black Sox scandal]]: The [[Cincinnati Reds]] win the [[World Series]].
*[[1934]] &ndash; [[Regicide]] at [[Marseille]]: The assassination of King [[Alexander I of Yugoslavia]] and [[Louis Barthou]], Foreign Minister of France.
*[[1936]] &ndash; Generators at Boulder Dam (later renamed to [[Hoover Dam]]) begin to generate electricity from the [[Colorado River (U.S.)|Colorado River]] and transmit it 266 miles to [[Los Angeles]].
*[[1940]] &ndash; [[World War II]]: [[Battle of Britain]] &ndash; During a night-time air raid by the German [[Luftwaffe]], [[St Paul's Cathedral|St. Paul's Cathedral]] in the [[City of London]], England is hit by a bomb.
*[[1941]] &ndash; A coup in [[Panama]] declares [[Ricardo Adolfo de la Guardia Arango]] the new president.
*[[1942]] &ndash; [[Statute of Westminster 1931]] formalises Australian autonomy.
*  1942   &ndash; The last day of the October [[Actions along the Matanikau (September – October 1942)|Matanikau action]] on [[Guadalcanal]] as [[United States Marine Corps]] forces withdraw back across the [[Matanikau River]] after destroying most of the [[Imperial Japanese Army]]'s 4th Infantry Regiment.
*[[1945]] &ndash; Parade in [[NYC]] for [[Fleet Admiral]] [[Chester W. Nimitz|Nimitz]] and 13 USN/USMC [[Medal of Honor]] recipients
*[[1950]] &ndash; [[Goyang Geumjeong Cave Massacre]] started.
*[[1962]] &ndash; [[Uganda]] becomes an independent [[Commonwealth realm]].
*[[1963]] &ndash; In northeast Italy, over 2,000 people are killed when a large [[landslide]] behind the [[Vajont Dam]] causes a giant wave of water to overtop it.
*[[1966]] &ndash; [[Vietnam War]]: [[Binh Tai Massacre]]
*  1966   &ndash; Vietnam War: [[Diên Niên - Phước Bình massacre]]
*[[1967]] &ndash; A day after being captured, Marxist revolutionary [[Ernesto "Che" Guevara]] is executed for attempting to incite a revolution in [[Bolivia]].
*[[1969]] &ndash; In Chicago, the [[United States National Guard]] is called in for crowd control as demonstrations continue in connection with the trial of the "[[Chicago Eight]]" that began on [[September 24]].
*[[1970]] &ndash; The [[Khmer Republic]] is proclaimed in [[Cambodia]].
*[[1980]] &ndash; [[Pope John Paul II]] shakes hands with the [[Dalai Lama]] during a private audience in [[Vatican City]].
*  1980   &ndash; Princess [[Caroline of Monaco]] divorces Philippe Junot.
*[[1981]] &ndash; Abolition of [[capital punishment]] in France.
*[[1983]] &ndash; [[Rangoon bombing]]: attempted assassination of South Korean President [[Chun Doo-hwan]] during an official visit to [[Yangon|Rangoon]], [[Burma]]. Chun survives but the blast kills 17 of his entourage, including four cabinet ministers, and injures 17 others. Four Burmese officials also die in the blast.
*[[1986]] &ndash; The musical ''[[The Phantom of the Opera (1986 musical)|The Phantom of the Opera]]'' has its first performance at [[Her Majesty's Theatre]] in London.
*[[1989]] &ndash; An official news agency in the [[Soviet Union]] reports the landing of a [[Unidentified flying object|UFO]] in [[Voronezh]].
*[[1991]] &ndash; [[Ecuador]] becomes a member of the [[Berne Convention for the Protection of Literary and Artistic Works|Berne Convention]] [[copyright]] [[treaty]].
*[[1992]] &ndash; A 13 kilogram (est.) fragment of the [[Peekskill meteorite]] lands in the driveway of the Knapp residence in [[Peekskill, New York]], destroying the family's 1980 [[Chevrolet Malibu]]
*[[1995]] &ndash; An [[Amtrak]] [[Sunset Limited]] train is [[1995 Palo Verde derailment|derailed]] by [[saboteur]]s near [[Palo Verde, Arizona]].
*[[1999]] &ndash; The last flight of the [[SR-71]].
*[[2001]] &ndash; Second mailing of [[anthrax]] letters from [[Trenton, New Jersey|Trenton]], [[New Jersey]] in the [[2001 anthrax attack]].
*[[2003]] &ndash; [[Mission: SPACE]] opens to the public in the [[Epcot]] park at [[Walt Disney World]]. The opening ceremony included several astronauts from all eras of space exploration.
*[[2006]] &ndash; [[North Korea]] allegedly tests [[2006 North Korean nuclear test|its first nuclear device]].
*[[2009]] &ndash; First [[moon|lunar]] impact of the Centaur and [[LCROSS]] [[spacecraft]]s as part of [[NASA]]'s [[Lunar Precursor Robotic Program]].
*[[2012]] &ndash; Members of the Pakistani [[Taliban]] made a failed attempt to assassinate [[Malala Yousafzai]] on her way home from school.
